reuters.title: GREATER NEW YORK SAVINGS BANK <GRTR.O> 3RD QTR
reuters.body: Shr 57 cts vs N/A Net 7,222,000 vs 6,959,000 Nine mths Shr N/A vs N/A Net 17.6 mln vs 24.8 mln Assets 2.7 billion vs 2.3 billion NOTE: Year-ago per shr amts not available as bank converted to stock ownership June 24, 1987. 1987 3rd qtr and nine mths has 2.9 mln and 7.4 mln dlrs for tax credits. 1986 3rd and nine mths 2.1 mln and 7.9 mln dlrs for tax credits. Reuter 
